meaningInfo: All buildings have at least one scooter. It could be out front, on the roof, in the basement. But all of them have scooters and someone who likes to ride them instead of using a car or a bike.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>All</kanji> of these scooters have a specific sound they make as they burst out of the buildings: <reading>zuwee</reading> (<ja>ずい</ja>).
readingInfo: Imagine the sound of the scooter's tiny engine: zuwee zuwee zu zu zuwee. All of them do this, which is why you hate them.
